content:
nullSalesforce Premier Success Plan Resources
Publish Date: May 23, 2024
Description
 	
   •   Get to Know the Premier Success Plan
   •   How to Access Premier Resources
   •   Get Expert Guidance
   •   Get Support
   •   Get Self-Guided Resources

Get to Know the Premier Success Plan

Salesforce Success Plans provide the right level of guidance and support to suit your organization’s needs. With the Premier Success Plan you get access to expert guidance and enhanced customer support. Watch this video to learn about all the great benefits that come with Premier Success:



If you’re a Premier or Signature customer and you still have questions after reviewing this article, you can request an individual follow-up here.
How to Access Premier Resources

There are two things you need to do before you can access Premier resources:
Set up your Trailblazer Account.
Set up your company’s Designated Contact.

Your Trailblazer Account allows you to easily log in to all of Salesforce’s digital experiences (Trailhead, Salesforce Events, Salesforce Help, Trailblazer Community, Salesforce+, etc.) using one authenticated username.

Designated Contacts are individuals within your organization who act as the primary contacts for requesting Expert Coaching Sessions and working with Salesforce Support.

Watch this video to learn how to set up your Trailblazer Account and Designated Contacts:




Get Expert Guidance

Premier Success Plan customers have exclusive access to our catalog of Expert Coaching Sessions, discounted instructor-led training and bulk certification exams, and personalized Onboarding.

These programs provide best practices and use case guidance to help you implement Salesforce right the first time and get the most from your Salesforce investment.

Sign Up for Expert Coaching Sessions

Expert Coaching Sessions are specialized engagements with a Salesforce expert that focus on a specific topic. They're designed to help you get more value from Salesforce, faster. We offer videos, webinars, and individual sessions.

Customers with either a Premier Success Plan or Signature Success Plan can access all three types of Expert Coaching Sessions. Premier and Signature customers can schedule an individual session as a follow-up to a video or webinar session. An individual session is a standalone engagement.

Expert Coaching on the Success Events Platform has recently undergone a significant transformation to create a digital and dynamic Expert Coaching Events Catalog. The list of session topics is always expanding to address your needs.

Watch this video to learn how to sign up for an Expert Coaching Session:




   •   Explore the Expert Coaching Catalog
   •   Browse Expert Coaching Videos
   •   Discover Upcoming Expert Coaching Webinars
   •   How to Request an Individual Expert Coaching Session


Start Strong with Courses and Certifications

As a part of Premier, customers receive discounts on Trailhead Academy courses and bulk certification exams. To learn more, contact your Salesforce account team.

Benefits do not apply to custom private workshops and in-person boot camps.


Onboarding

As you start your Premier journey, an onboarding specialist will directly work with you to align your goals and objectives with Salesforce product capabilities so you can craft your strategy to drive tangible business results.

Get Support

Access Help When You Need It

Salesforce Help is your online destination for all of your support and guidance needs, including product documentation and knowledge articles.

Contact Salesforce Support

Salesforce is here to help. Learn how to reach out to Customer Support in a number of ways.

   •   How to Call Salesforce Customer Support
   •   Salesforce Phone Support Numbers and Availability by Region and Language
   •   How to Submit a Support Case
   •   How to Escalate a Support Case
   •   Working with Salesforce Customer Support

Developer Support

Developer Support can help you troubleshoot, analyze, and debug error messages related to Apex, API Integrations, AMPscript, Visualforce code, and more.

Get Self-Guided Resources

Leverage our ecosystem to go further with Salesforce. Every customer gets access to Trailhead, the Trailblazer Community, Customer Success Events, AppExchange, and more.

   •   Learn on Trailhead
   •   Explore the Trailblazer Community
   •   Join Customer Success Events
   •   Browse the AppExchange
   •   Salesforce Support YouTube Channel
   •   Developer Homepage
   •   Recommendation Maps
